_instructions.howToAddNewEvent: To add a new ICPC timeline entry, simply add a new object to the timeline array with the following fields: year (academic year), entries (array of team participations). Each entry should have: id (unique), team, members (array), event, rank, description, imagePath (filename from src/assets/images/icpc/), and optional linkedinPost.
_instructions.imagePath_example: Put your image in src/assets/images/icpc/ folder and use just the filename like '2024-team.jpg'
_instructions.year_sorting: Timeline items are displayed in reverse chronological order (newest first)

aboutICPC.title: About ICPC
description: The International Collegiate Programming Contest (ICPC) is the world's most prestigious algorithmic competition for university students.
Over the years, Turing Hut members have consistently proven their excellence in ICPC and other competitive programming events across India.
Each year, our teams compete against the best programmers from colleges nationwide, showcasing the depth of competitive programming culture at VNRVJIET.

entries.description: After topping all other college teams, the team qualified and appeared for ICPC Asia West Amritapuri Regionals 2025.

After topping all other college teams, the team qualified and appeared for ICPC Asia West Amritapuri Regionals 2025 in their third year.
After topping all other college teams, the team qualified and appeared for ICPC Asia West Chennai Regionals 2025.
After topping all other college teams in RankList2, the team qualified and appeared for ICPC Chennai Regionals 2024.

After topping all other college teams, the team qualified and appeared for ICPC Kanpur Regionals 2023 in their second year and secured All India Rank 51.

After topping all other college teams for Amritapuri Site, the team qualified and appeared for ICPC Amritapuri Regionals 2023 and secured All India Rank 42 - missing the cut for the Asia West Continent Finals by just 4 spots, with the last qualifying team at Rank 38.
After topping all other college teams, the team qualified and appeared for ICPC Kanpur-Mathura Regionals 2022 in their second year.
